channel.title: Cyclance on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Cyclance on Chaotic Online

item.title: A Rare Hazard
item.description: In the first episode of the Second Season, we will have a closure for events of the previous episode, with right to terrorism and espionage

item.title: Battle Lessons
item.description: In this episode Tom gets to know more about the main event in Chaotic: The CodeMasters Matches!

item.title: Chaor's Commandos (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see an elite squad led by Chaor in a bold raid on Kiru City towards the Overworld Arsenal

item.title: Chaor's Commandos (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode we’ll see Chaor’s invasion to the Overworld Arsenal in Kiru City

item.title: Eye of the Maelstrom
item.description: In this episode, Tom and his friends will help Najarin and a group of Mipedians in an important mission and that trust is a gift, not a right

item.title: Last Stand (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode, the beginning of the end… the battle for Perim is now!

item.title: Legions of Aa'une (Season Finale)
item.description: In this episode, the battle continues with overturns and some shifting… and the end!

item.title: Putting the Muge in Mugic
item.description: In this episode we’ll have a common (and unnecessary) territorial war complete with treason, sabotage, counter-espionage and lessons of leadership between OverWorlders and Mipedians

item.title: Rockwave and Roll
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a match between Peyton and his musical idol, with rights to a subtle tribute to one of KISS’ lead singer Gene Simmons

item.title: Shifting Sands
item.description: In this episode Peyton shows to Tom that not all of the Mipedians are cruel and pitiless as those he met while rescuing Reggie.

item.title: The Thing About Bodal
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Bodal, a Creature very talkative, annoying and cocky about himself. We’ll also see the most improbable of all fights in Chaotic.

item.title: Threshold of Destruction
item.description: In this episode, once Dranakis Threshold’s secret leaked out, several players ported to ancient Perim, including Chaotic’s “Bonnie & Clyde”, who didn’t take long in conspiring with an old acquaintance, making of a painful event become, potentially, irreversible.

item.title: Triple Threat
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the Tribal Alliance overcoming its cultural differences so they united may have a chance against the M’arrillians

item.title: Trivias: Worlds Apart
item.description: A small video with the Trivia originally present in episode Worlds Apart

item.title: Unexpected
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet the fourth member of the group, Peyton, and his… “eccentric”, personality.

item.title: Worlds Apart
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Jycella, Krystella’s twin sister, and we’ll see that the bad relationship between them, common among humans, also happens in Perim, with the twin sisters Aivenna and Nivenna
